pairs.subject: Important: Update Your Payroll Information
pairs.desc:
Dear Employee,

We are conducting a routine audit of our payroll information. Please ensure that your details are up to date by reviewing the attached document. If you find any discrepancies, kindly fill out the necessary information and return it to us by the end of the week.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
HR Department
pairs.explain: This email is from the HR department and contains a legitimate request for updating payroll information with a safe attachment.

pairs.subject: Urgent: Verify Your Payroll Information Immediately
pairs.desc:
Dear Employee,

We have detected a critical issue with your payroll information that requires your immediate attention. Please open the attached file and verify your details. Failure to do so may result in payment delays.

Regards,
HR Team
pairs.explain: This email contains a malicious attachment and uses urgency to trick the employee into opening it.

pairs.subject: Quarterly Financial Report Available
pairs.desc:
Hello Team,

I hope this message finds you well. The quarterly financial report for Q3 is now available. Please find the attached document for your review. We encourage everyone to go through it and familiarize themselves with our financial performance.

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.

Best,
Finance Department
pairs.explain: This email is from the finance department with a legitimate document attached for review.

pairs.subject: Immediate Action Required: Financial Report Attached
pairs.desc:
Dear Employee,

Your immediate attention is required regarding the attached financial report. Please download and execute the file to ensure compliance with our financial protocols. Delays may lead to serious consequences.

Thank you,
Finance Team
pairs.explain: This email contains a harmful attachment and creates a sense of urgency, which is a common phishing tactic.

pairs.subject: IT Security Training Scheduled
pairs.desc:
Dear Team,

We are pleased to announce that an IT security training session has been scheduled for next week. Please find the details in the attached document. Attendance is mandatory for all employees to ensure we are all up to date with the latest security protocols.

Best regards,
IT Department
pairs.explain: This email provides information about a legitimate training session with a safe attachment.

pairs.subject: Urgent: Confirm Your IT Security Training Attendance
pairs.desc:
Hello,

You must confirm your attendance for the upcoming IT security training by opening the attached file. Failure to do so will result in restricted access to company systems.

Thank you,
IT Team
pairs.explain: This email attempts to trick the employee into opening a malicious attachment under the guise of confirming attendance.

pairs.subject: New Travel Policy Update
pairs.desc:
Dear Employees,

We have updated our travel policy to better accommodate your needs. Please review the attached document for all the new guidelines and procedures. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to reach out.

Best,
Travel Department
pairs.explain: This email is a legitimate communication regarding a travel policy update with a safe attachment.

pairs.subject: Action Required: Review Your Travel Policy Now
pairs.desc:
Attention Employee,

You are required to review the updated travel policy immediately. Please download and open the attached file to ensure compliance. Not doing so may affect your future travel requests.

Regards,
Travel Team
pairs.explain: This email contains a harmful attachment and uses urgency to compel the employee to open it.

pairs.subject: Legal Document Review Required
pairs.desc:
Dear Team,

Please find attached a legal document that requires your review. Make sure to provide your feedback by the end of the week. Your input is valuable in ensuring compliance with our legal obligations.

Thank you,
Legal Department
pairs.explain: This email is a legitimate request from the legal department with a safe attachment.

pairs.subject: Immediate Review Required: Legal Document Attached
pairs.desc:
Dear Employee,

You must review the attached legal document immediately to avoid any compliance issues. Open the file and follow the instructions provided. Delays may result in serious consequences.

Best,
Legal Team
pairs.explain: This email contains a malicious attachment and creates a false sense of urgency.
